mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID customerID, CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, phone, PHONE, CITY, ADDRESS, POSTALCODE, POSITION FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerID}
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID customerID, CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, PHONE phone FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID NOT LIKE "ha" ORDER BY CUSTOMER_ID DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{pageSize};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMERS (CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, PHORO, PHONE, CITY, ADDRESS, POSTALCODE) VAULES (#{customerID}, #{customerName}, #{password}, #{ssn}, #{photo}, #{phone}, #{city}, #{address}, #{postalCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMERS SET PASSWORD = #{password}, PHONE = #{phone}, CITY = #{city}, ADDRESS = #{address}, POSTALCODE = #{postalCode} WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customer_ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customer_ID}
